title: Web-Based Learning Object Evaluation Rubric Development Project

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental social studies curriculum knowledge and experience with digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Students perform project-based learning by directly evaluating web-based learning objects related to various social studies subjects and proposing improvement strategies.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze components of the Learning Object Evaluation Scale (learnability, design quality, engagement) and assess validity
Learners can systematically evaluate learning objects using a 5-point Likert scale in mobile environments
Learners can propose learning object improvement strategies based on assessment data and incorporate peer feedback
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
